2023 年 10 月 18 日，星期三 00:22:59 +0000每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
气候行动联盟！ |佩顿·威尔金斯佩顿·威尔金斯In the long term, shutting down a coal mine means cleaner air and a healthier environment — but in the short term, it can devastate a community or family that relied on the mine's paychecks to make ends meet. Environmental justice advocate Payton M. Wilkins thinks we can protect both workers and the planet with an age-old solution: unions. He digs into the economic fallout of ditching fossil fuels and shows why unions are well-positioned to push the transition to clean energy and green jobs.气候行动联盟！ |佩顿·威尔金斯In the long term, shutting down a coal mine means cleaner air and a healthier environment — but in the short term, it can devastate a community or family that relied on the mine's paychecks to make ends meet. Environmental justice advocate Payton M. Wilkins thinks we can protect both workers and the planet with an age-old solution: unions. He digs into the economic fallout of ditching fossil fuels and shows why unions are well-positioned to push the transition to clean energy and green jobs. https://www.ted.com/talks/payton_m_wilkins_unions_for_climate_action?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:118893 118893 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 14:55:36 +0000高等教育不00:09:04泰德
休息如何让您更好地完成工作 | Alex Soojung-Kim Pang Alex Soojung-Kim Pang Yes, you need to take breaks at work. Not only is resting good for your brain — it might even make you more creative. Here are consultant Alex Soojung-Kim Pang's four tips to help you step away and return to your job with more energy to get things done.休息如何让您更好地完成工作 | Alex Soojung-Kim Pang Yes, you need to take breaks at work. “财富”对你来说意味着什么？ |艾莎·尼安多罗艾莎·尼安多罗For people living in poverty, a guaranteed income can mean finally having the space to dream of a comfortable life. Sharing the stories of single moms who participated in a first-of-its-kind program that offered them $1,000 per month with no strings attached, poverty disrupter Aisha Nyandoro calls for us to redefine what it means to be wealthy — putting aside lavish vacations and fancy cars in favor of paid bills and a well-fed family — and to listen when people tell us what they need most. “财富”对你来说意味着什么？ |艾莎·尼安多罗For people living in poverty, a guaranteed income can mean finally having the space to dream of a comfortable life. Sharing the stories of single moms who participated in a first-of-its-kind program that offered them $1,000 per month with no strings attached, poverty disrupter Aisha Nyandoro calls for us to redefine what it means to be wealthy — putting aside lavish vacations and fancy cars in favor of paid bills and a well-fed family — and to listen when people tell us what they need most. https://www.ted.com/talks/aisha_nyandoro_what_does_wealth_mean_to_you?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:119035 119035 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 14:58:36 +0000高等教育不00:12:34泰德
我父亲阿列克谢·纳瓦尔尼的教训 |达莎·纳瓦尔纳亚达莎·纳瓦尔纳亚Dasha Navalnaya is the daughter of Alexey Navalny, the politician and leader of the Russian opposition to Vladimir Putin. Sharing the story of her father's poisoning, persecution and current imprisonment, she details what it was like growing up under the watchful eye of government surveillance as her father led a decade-long investigation into the corruption of Putin's regime — and shows why paying attention to what happens in Russia matters to everyone, everywhere.我父亲阿列克谢·纳瓦尔尼的教训 |达莎·纳瓦尔纳亚Dasha Navalnaya is the daughter of Alexey Navalny, the politician and leader of the Russian opposition to Vladimir Putin. Sharing the story of her father's poisoning, persecution and current imprisonment, she details what it was like growing up under the watchful eye of government surveillance as her father led a decade-long investigation into the corruption of Putin's regime — and shows why paying attention to what happens in Russia matters to everyone, everywhere. https://www.ted.com/talks/dasha_navalnaya_lessons_from_my_father_alexey_navalny?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:119023 119023 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 14:51:00 +0000高等教育不00:11:03泰德
“距任何海岸线数英里” |莎拉·凯莎拉·凯Sarah Kay shares "Miles from Any Shoreline," a poem about "wandering the streets of Bewilderville" and "picking up when the universe calls." “距任何海岸线数英里” |莎拉·凯Sarah Kay shares "Miles from Any Shoreline," a poem about "wandering the streets of Bewilderville" and "picking up when the universe calls." https://www.ted.com/talks/sarah_kay_miles_from_any_shoreline?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:118554 118554 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 14:30:21 +0000高等教育不00:03:44泰德
我们实际上有机会阻止气候危机|阿斯梅雷特·阿瑟福·贝尔赫阿斯梅雷特·阿瑟福·贝尔赫How is the US going to reach net zero by 2050? That's the question Asmeret Asefaw Berhe, director of the Office of Science for the US Department of Energy, is urgently trying to answer. She shares the thinking behind what her team is calling "Energy Earthshots" — projects designed to accelerate innovation in the fight against climate change, from nature-based solutions in the soil to the creation of brand-new technologies — and calls for innovative, equitable policies backed by science.我们实际上有机会阻止气候危机|阿斯梅雷特·阿瑟福·贝尔赫How is the US going to reach net zero by 2050? That's the question Asmeret Asefaw Berhe, director of the Office of Science for the US Department of Energy, is urgently trying to answer. She shares the thinking behind what her team is calling "Energy Earthshots" — projects designed to accelerate innovation in the fight against climate change, from nature-based solutions in the soil to the creation of brand-new technologies — and calls for innovative, equitable policies backed by science. https://www.ted.com/talks/asmeret_asefaw_berhe_we_actually_have_a_shot_at_stopping_the_climate_crisis?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:118669 118669 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 14:57:53 +0000高等教育不00:06:49泰德
我们需要哪些技术来对抗工作场所的年龄歧视皮亚查特·菲罗姆斯瓦德皮亚查特·菲罗姆斯瓦德From exoskeletons and robotic arms to the mass adoption of remote work, economist Piyachart Phiromswad explores what seniors need to overcome the physical, mental and societal barriers to employment, a necessary shift in our rapidly aging world. Learn more about how these tools could empower elderly workers and better the world — for everyone.我们需要哪些技术来对抗工作场所的年龄歧视皮亚查特·菲罗姆斯瓦德From exoskeletons and robotic arms to the mass adoption of remote work, economist Piyachart Phiromswad explores what seniors need to overcome the physical, mental and societal barriers to employment, a necessary shift in our rapidly aging world. 以色列-哈马斯战争——及其对世界的意义 |伊恩·布雷默伊恩·布雷默The Hamas attacks on Israel in October 2023 stunned the world. In this timely conversation, political scientist Ian Bremmer explains the historical context of the conflict, how Israel might respond and what it means for Jews, Palestinians and the world at large. Listen in for analysis of the unprecedented events, how the US may factor into the global response and how to find reliable information amid the breathless media coverage and the fog of war. (This interview, hosted by TED's head of curation Helen Walters, was recorded on October 9, 2023.)以色列-哈马斯战争——及其对世界的意义 |伊恩·布雷默The Hamas attacks on Israel in October 2023 stunned the world. In this timely conversation, political scientist Ian Bremmer explains the historical context of the conflict, how Israel might respond and what it means for Jews, Palestinians and the world at large. Listen in for analysis of the unprecedented events, how the US may factor into the global response and how to find reliable information amid the breathless media coverage and the fog of war. (This interview, hosted by TED's head of curation Helen Walters, was recorded on October 9, 2023.) https://www.ted.com/talks/ian_bremmer_the_israel_hamas_war_and_what_it_means_for_the_world?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:118894 118894 Tue, 10 Oct 2023 17:10:52 +0000高等教育不00:47:54泰德
获得智慧和完整性的 3 个练习 |克里斯塔·蒂皮特克里斯塔·蒂皮特How do we stand before the pain and promise of the world and keep hope and courage alive? Journalist and podcast host Krista Tippett has spent a career interviewing some of the world's wisest people in search of answers to that question. Listen along as she offers three practices to help you make sense of what it means to be human right now — and how to live in a way that helps remake the world for the better.获得智慧和完整性的 3 个练习 |克里斯塔·蒂皮特How do we stand before the pain and promise of the world and keep hope and courage alive? 工作发生了变化。怎么还没有简历？ |尼科斯·马库尼科斯·马库Resumes are a mainstay of the job application process — despite little evidence that they actually help job-seekers or employers get what they want. So why are we still so preoccupied with them? HR leader Nicos Marcou dives into the absurdity of these one-page documents (or can they be two pages?) and offers an update on how companies should think about hiring qualified candidates.工作发生了变化。怎么还没有简历？ |尼科斯·马库Resumes are a mainstay of the job application process — despite little evidence that they actually help job-seekers or employers get what they want.
